name: Darwinder
description:
Darwinder is a puzzle game in which you play as a monster, and you must find your mate and build your genes to survive the different cataclysms on your planet by using a monster dating app.

This project has been made for the GGJ 2023 by three students at E-art Sup Paris.

TEAM:

Programmer: Fayçal KHILA, Ulysse LANGEVIN

Concept Artist: Eloi JODET
